00002 package de.aitools.aq.invertedindex.io;
00003 
00004 import java.io.File;
00005 import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
00006 import java.io.FileOutputStream;
00007 import java.io.OutputStream;
00008 import java.io.PrintStream;
00009 
00010 import de.aitools.aq.check.A;
00011 import de.aitools.aq.util.Record;
00012 import de.aitools.aq.value.Value;
00013 
00020 public class InvertedFileWriter<V extends Value> {
00021         
00022         public InvertedFileWriter(OutputStream stream) {
00023                 writer = new PrintStream(stream);
00024                 lastKey = new String();
00025         }
00026         
00027         public InvertedFileWriter(File file) throws FileNotFoundException {
00028                 this(new FileOutputStream(file));
00029         }
00030 
00031         public void close() {
00032                 writer.close();
00033         }
00034         
00035         public void write(Record<V> record) {
00036                 A.CHECK(record.getKey().indexOf(Record.DELIMITER) == -1,
00037                                 "No tabulator allowed in key : " + record.getKey());
00038 //              String asciiKey = ToAsciiEncoder.encode(record.getKey());
00039                 String asciiKey = record.getKey();
00040                 if (!lastKey.equals(asciiKey)) {
00041                         if (!lastKey.isEmpty()) {
00042                                 writer.println();
00043                         }
00044                         writer.print(asciiKey);
00045                         lastKey = asciiKey;
00046                 }
00047                 writer.print(Record.DELIMITER);
00048                 record.getValue().printTo(writer);
00049         }
00050         
00051         private PrintStream writer;
00052         private String lastKey;
00053 }
